Maintenance type: General inspection, signs of movement on shafts, condition of link chain (corrosion), wear of tooth profile where the link chain interfaces with the hubs.

The MS Torque Limiter friction linings have a minimum thickness of 2mm.
Replace if this limit is reached.

The operating area should be examined for contamination such as dust and fibres which may indicate the MS Torque Limiter has been subject to forces which are causing the MS Torque Limiter to slip and slipping will lead to the wear of the linings. The MS Torque Limiter should be examined to assess if the unit is clean, dry and without signs of any possible contamination which may alter the performance through the contamination of the friction linings.
To ensure MS Torque Limiter slips when specified torque setting is exceeded.
